name: One of the best shows ever
reviewBody:
I watched this show and it has been the only show that has made me laugh. The show may seem kind of weird but hey id I had my own show I would end up having like this show.

This show is brilliant and its is a Jimmy Kimmel Production and we all should know Jimmy Kimmel can make some some pretty good stuff.

So to conclude my statement Andy Milonakis You have made the best show that I've ever seen on TV and for people who think this show is retarded you have to be retarded. and MTV you should move this show to 9:00 on the Sunday stew instead of 11:00 because people need to know about this show...
